Title: Object: Alexandria
Description: Coastal view with a figure sitting in profile in the left foreground, sketching a monumental column on a beach in the centre, ships mooring in a harbour behind, a building with dome and towers behind the harbour, the city wall on a hill in the right background; after an unidentified print; illustration to Harding's 'Shakespeare Illustrated' (1793). c.1793 Etching
Curator's comments: For details of the book see 1868,0822.6277.
Associated titles: Associated Title: Antony and Cleopatra (I, i)
